prompt: Create a modern products list interface with a vertical scrollable layout. Each product card should feature a circular icon placeholder at the top, followed by the product name in bold typography, a short description in smaller gray text, and the price in vibrant green. Include an 'Add to Cart' button with rounded corners and a blue background below the price. Use a clean white background with subtle card shadows for depth. Ensure proper spacing between elements, with 16px padding around the list and 12px between cards. The app bar should have a minimalist design with a black title and no elevation.
